affected_components.name: LATIN AMERICA - Zoom Phone - Zoom Phone

incident_updates.body:
In addition to hardware clients that do not support failover, singly connected BYOC customers will also be impacted.

If you are a BYOC (Bring Your Own Carrier) customer, please ensure that your Session Border Controller (SBC) is configured with alternate routing to the Sao Paulo (SP) and Mexico (QR) data center in addition to the Sao Paulo datacenter (SP). 

Connectivity to the Sao Paulo datacenter (SP) is blocked, which will force calls from the Session Border Controller (SBC) to failover to the Mexico (QR) data center.

We will continue to provide updates as we have them.
